alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 2:51AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Cherry County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Blizzard Warning, from midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travel. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
